summary:
These mods replace the faces of Vorstag, Erik the Slayer, Onmund, Marcurio, Stenvar, Belrand, Benor, Mjoll the Lioness and Aerin, the 5 housecarls: Argis, Calder, Iona, Jordis and Lydia, of 6 of the companions: Vilkas, Farkas, Aela the Huntress, Athis, Njada Stonearm and Ria, and of Jenassa, Uthgerd the Unbroken and Brelyna Maryon.
It also ad
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=yellow]
[size=3]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You can not use my assets in any mods/files that are being sold, for money, on Steam Workshop or other platforms
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]
[/color][/center]

Name: Ashara's Follower faces
Version: 8.0
Date: 10-12-2013
Category: NPC
Requirements: latest Skyrim patch (1.9.32)
Author(s): Ashara
Source:
* Nexus: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20729
* Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=103695124

[center][size=14][color=yellow]Description
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
These mods replace the faces of Erik the Slayer before and after he becomes an elligible follower, of Vorstag, of Onmund, of Marcurio, of Stenvar, of Belrand, of Benor, of Mjoll the Lioness and Aerin, of the 5 housecarls: Argis the Bulwark, Calder, Iona, Jordis the Sword-Maiden and Lydia, of 6 of the companions: Vilkas, Farkas, Aela the Huntress, Athis, Njada Stonearm and Ria, and of Jenassa, Uthgerd the Unbroken and Brelyna Maryon.

It also adds three custom high elf male followers, Finrod, Amroth and Mablung. You can find them at the Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun.
Finrod is a Spellsword, Amroth a Ranger and Mablung a 2 handed warrior.

They are fully compatible with UFO and Convenient Horses.

I've tried to make Mjoll's face (she is a Nord) as close as possible to the first face I made for my character Sienna (she is an Imperial), as requested on Steam. And as Aerin is her loyal companion, I've tweaked his face, too.

If you see a neck gap in any of the followers:
1.- open the console
2.- select follower by clicking on him

For Erik and Erik the Slayer:
3.- type setnpcweight 60

For Vorstag:
3.- type setnpcweight 75

For Onmund:
3.- type setnpcweight 60

For Marcurio:
3.- type setnpcweight 10

For Stenvar:
3.- type setnpcweight 100

For Belrand:
3.- type setnpcweight 80

For Benor:
3.- type setnpcweight 90

For Mjoll the Lioness:
3.- type setnpcweight 75

For Aerin:
3.- type setnpcweight 40

For Argis the Bulwark:
3.- type setnpcweight 100

For Calder:
3.- type setnpcweight 50

For Iona:
3.- type setnpcweight 90

For Jordis the Sword-Maiden:
3.- type setnpcweight 70

For Lydia:
3.- type setnpcweight 100

For Vilkas:
3.- type setnpcweight 45

For Farkas:
3.- type setnpcweight 95

For Aela:
3.- type setnpcweight 20

For Athis:
3.- type setnpcweight 0

For Njada:
3.- type setnpcweight 50

For Ria:
3.- type setnpcweight 90

For Jenassa:
3.- type setnpcweight 20

For Uthgerd the Unbroken:
3.- type setnpcweight 100

For Brelyna Maryon:
3.- type setnpcweight 10

[size=14][color=yellow]Required mods
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
None. Only the latest Skyrim patch (1.9.32)

[size=14][color=yellow]Mods used in pictures
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
If you want to see them as shown in the pictures, these are the mods I use:
* BellaGail's "Better Females by Bella": http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812 (less make up version 2)
* Chris57's "Better males" (file "Faces - YoungerFacesMergedWithMenByGeonox" : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488
* Navetsea's "Straight hair retexture" : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4333
* Aluminumfoil's "Eyebrows Match Hair": http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=627
* Ran's "RANs HeadMesh Variants":http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7127 (RANs type-A headmesh)
* LogRaam's "The Eyes of Beauty": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722 (version for NPCs)
* Zzjay's "Better Females By Bella Natural Edition ": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26113 (Less makeup version. In Mjoll's picture)
* HumanNature66's "HN66s Long Eye Lashes": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27783
* mrLenski's "Coverwomen": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3563 /(only the new lips tintmask, nothing else)
* Maevan2's "Mature skin texture and body": http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32986//? (only the diffuse or colour map, the rest is from Bella's mods. In pictures of followers from version 5.0)
* Lthot's "Beards": http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/? (In pictures from version 7.0)
* Lthot's "Brows": http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/? (In pictures from version 7.0)

[size=14][color=yellow]Install
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Download the file
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Activates the selected mod" button.
When asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".

Manual install
------------------
1. Extract the files of this mod to a temporary location (you can use 7zip: http://www.7-zip.org, to unzip them) and chek the folder structure.
2. Copy to (My documents folder) My GamesSkyrimData:
.- the esp file
.- the meshes folder
.- the textures folder
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".
3. In Skyrim launcher select "Data Files" and activate AsharaFollowerFaces.esp

If you are using a mod that affects followers, like UFO, make sure that AsharaFollowerFaces.esp is loaded after the esp file from that mod (UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul.esp) or you will see their default faces in game.

[size=14][color=yellow]Uninstall
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
-------------------------------------
1. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Deactivates the selected mod" button.

Manual uninstall
----------------
1. In Skyrim Launcher select "Data Files" and deactivate the AsharaFollowerFaces.esp
2. Delete
.- the file DataAsharaFollowerFaces.esp
.- the folder DatameshesAsharaFollowers hairs and its contents
.- the folder DatatexturesAsharaFollowers hairs and its contents
.- the files included in this mod from the folder meshesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceGeomSkyrim.esm
.- the files included in this mod from the folder texturesactorscharacterfacegendatafacetintSkyrim.esm
.- the folder meshesactorscharacterFaceGenDataFaceGeomAsharaFollowerFaces.esp and its contents
.- the folder texturesactorscharacterfacegendatafacetintAsharaFollowerFaces.esp and its contents

[size=14][color=yellow]Incompatibility
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Any other mod that replaces the faces of the NPCs contained here.

If you are using the Realistic teeth mod, install the patch under the optional files.

[size=14][color=yellow]Tutorials
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=User:SydneyB]Other Tutorials[/url]

[size=14][color=yellow]History
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
8.0, 10-12-2013 - added faces for Jenassa, Uthgerd the Unbroken and Brelyna Maryon.
7.0, 04-10-2013 - added faces of 6 of the companions: Vilkas, Farkas, Aela the Huntress, Athis, Njada Stonearm and Ria.
6.0, 23-09-2013 - changed Vorstag's face.
5.0, 24-08-2013 - added three custom high elf followers: Finrod, Amroth and Mablung. Added faces for the five housecarls: Argis the Bulwark, Calder, Iona, Jordis the Sword-Maiden and Lydia.
4.0, 14-01-2013 - included the hairs in the mod so it is not dependant on Apachii's hair mods.
3.2, 01-01-2013 - added Mjoll the Lioness and Aerin.
3.1, 06-12-2012 - added Benor.
3.0, 20-10-2012 - added Belrand.
2.0, 24-09-2012 - added Stenvar and made it a unique esp file.
1.0, 17-08-2012 - added Marcurio.
1.0, 04-08-2012 - added Onmund.
1.0, 18-07-2012 - Initial release.

[size=14][color=yellow]Contact
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
You can contact me leaving a comment at the file's thread, sending me a PM or leaving a comment at the mod's thread.

You can find me on Nexus as SydneyB: http://www.tesnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=259193.
You can find me on the Bethesda official forums as Ashara: http://www.bethsoft.com/bgsforums/index.php?showuser=364891.
You can find me on Clan Dlan as Ashara: http://www.clandlan.net/foros/index.php?showuser=6932.

[size=14][color=yellow]Credits
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to Phnx at Tesadventures for the tutorial on how to import your character's face into the CK: http://tesadventures.com/forum/index.php?topic=4082.0
Thanks to Apachii for converting the hairs for Skyrim. Also thanks to the original authours of the hairs:
* Peggysims for Mjoll's hair
* 8k for Vorstag's (old face) and for Brelyna Maryon's hairs
* callum91 for Erik's hair
* Geonox for Belrand and Benor's hairs
* Lapiz Djinn for Stenvar's and Vorstag's (new face) hairs
* Newsea for Aerin's, Jordis' and Aela's hairs
* melody9 for Onmund's hair
* Trapping for Mablung's hair
* Kozaburo for Lydia's hair
* RGMage2 for Iona's and Njada's hairs
* Nouk for Calder's and Uthgerd the Unbroken's hair
* Apachii for Amroth's hair
* Apachii, RGMage2, Geonox and Nouk for Argis' hair
* AlphaWolF and CD Projekt for Finrod's hair
Thanks to Omega99jp for Vilkas' and Ria's hairs.
Thanks to Nuska and NanaBeats for Jenassa's hair.
Thanks to LogRaam for the eye textures.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on: http://hammondslegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp
Thanks to Nexus for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to all the modding community for all their tutorials, tools and help. Especially, thanks to the Clan Dlan, Bethesda Official Forum and the Nexus communities.

[size=14][color=yellow]Tools used
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Construction Kit (available on Steam)
7zip - http://www.7-zip.org/
Readme Generator - http://lhammonds.game-host.org/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

[size=14][color=yellow]Permissions
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
You can reuse these characters's faces into your own mod but all I ask in return is that you give me credit if you distribute them.
If you want to reuse any of the hairs included here, you must ask permission to Apachii's first and also credit her and the original authors.
If you want to reuse Iona's or Njada's hairs you also must ask permission to RGMage2 and credit him if granted permission.
If you want to reuse Vilkas' or Ria's hairs, you must credit Omega99jp, too.
If you want to reuse any of the eye textures included here, you must ask LogRaam first and credit him if granted permission.

[size=14][color=yellow]My Skyrim mods
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]

author: SydneyB

files.name: Follower faces - Companions only
files.changelogHtml:
10-12-2013 - added faces for Jenassa, Uthgerd the Unbroken and Brelyna Maryon.
02-01-2014 - released a file containing only the housecarls faces as an optional file
02-01-2014 - released a file containing only the hirelings faces as an optional file
04-01-2014 - released a file containing only the faces for 6 of the followers you can recruit after perfomring a quest (Onmund, Benor, Mjoll the Lioness and Aerin, Uthgerd the Unbroken and Brelyna Maryon) as an optional file.
